messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Digest Number 4205
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/15/03 6:49:59 PM Central Standard Time, ... Sorry.  LOL.  I wasn t exactly clear, was I? By *we* I meant the unschooling community as a
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/15/03 6:49:59 PM Central Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:


> << Also, how old are you? We have lots of lists for unschooled
>
> teenagers that you might like too. >>
>
> We do?
> (who's we and where are these lists?)
>
>

Sorry. LOL. I wasn't exactly clear, was I?

By *we* I meant the unschooling community as a whole. I'm sure they're out
there. I know of two offhand, and if I know of two I'm assuming there must be
lots. Perhaps a flawed assumption. (Wouldn't be my first.)

So, Moon, what is it? Do you want a teen unschoolers' list? Shall we try to
track one down for you?

Laura B.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
